page.title: 03THE HOUSES AND STREETS
page.content:
Lower Wanborough is now the main part of the village.The main roads are High street,Rotten Row,Kite Hill,The Marsh and Burycroft.These roads contain the oldest houses,Sunnydale in Rotten Row is medieval,Magdalen cottage is a beautiful thatched cottage next door.Court Close also in Rotten Row is an old church.Other old cottages of note are Moat,Farncombe,Dena,Lake,Cattaways andWinchester all on the Marsh.we counted Approximately 50 old Houses. There is a new estate of 90 houses the main road in is Magdalen others branch off it they are The Dingle,Palmers Way,
As we looked up from the marsh the land was flat and wet sloping steeply up to the church.It was all farmland.
